message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I'll take a bit more, since I can wait and inflation is on my side.
Don't push it, Bob. This is still a good deal for you, and time is running out for both of us.
I'm willing to take a bit more risk to get a better deal. Inflation is still on my side.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains too!
I'm going to take an even bigger share. The pressure is on Alice, and I think she'll start to crack soon. Inflation is really hurting her now.
Okay, Bob, you win. This is getting too risky. Let's just end this before we both lose out.
